member.name: M:SmartLocalization.LanguageDataHandler.CheckLanguageOverrideCode(SmartLocalization.LocalizedObject)
member.summary: Helper method that checks and gets the language override code of the object is overridden. If it's not - it will return the currently loaded language.

member.name: T:SmartLocalization.ChangeLanguageEventHandler
member.summary: Change language event handler.

member.name: T:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager
member.summary: The language worker class for runtime language handling

member.name: P:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.Instance
member.summary: Returns an instance of the language manager. Creates a new one if no one exist. If you don't want to create a new one, check the LanguageManager.HasInstance variable first. NOTE: This is not set to DontDestroyOnLoad. You will have to do that yourself. Call LanguageManager.SetDontDestroyOnLoad

member.name: M:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.SetDontDestroyOnLoad
member.summary: Sets DontDestroyOnLoad flag on the LanguageManager object.

member.name: P:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.HasInstance
member.summary: Returns if there is an active instance of the language manager in the game.

member.name: F:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.OnChangeLanguage
member.summary: Occurs when a new language is loaded and initialized create a delegate method(ChangeLanguage(LanguageManager languageManager)) and subscribe

member.name: P:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.RawTextDatabase
member.summary: Gets all the language values in raw text. NOTE: Potentially performance expensive. Use with caution.

member.name: P:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.NumberOfSupportedLanguages
member.summary: The number of supported languages in this project

member.name: P:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.CurrentlyLoadedCulture
member.summary: Gets the currently loaded SmartCultureInfo.

member.name: P:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.VerboseLogging
member.summary: Set this to true if you want extensive error logging

member.name: M:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.ChangeLanguage(SmartLocalization.SmartCultureInfo)
member.summary: Change the language into a specified culture
member.param: The culture to change to

member.name: M:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.ChangeLanguage(System.String)
member.summary: Change the language into a specified culture
member.param: The culture to change to

member.name: M:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.ChangeLanguageWithData(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Tries to load a language with the specified data. Loading data from outside the project currently only supports text unless the asset is apparent(and correctly named in the right folder) in the workspace.
member.param: The language data to load in the .resx format
The ISO-639 code of the language to load

member.name: M:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.AppendLanguageWithTextData(System.String)
member.summary: Appends the current language with text data. The method does not support appending localized assets. If duplicates are found, the old value will be overwritten with the new one.
member.param: The language data to append in the .resx format
member.returns: Returns if the operation was a success

member.name: M:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.GetDeviceCultureIfSupported
member.summary: Gets the SmartCultureInfo of the current device language IF it's supported by the application. Otherwise it will return null

member.name: M:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.IsCultureSupported(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the culture is supported by this application using the ISO-639 code

member.name: M:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.IsCultureSupported(SmartLocalization.SmartCultureInfo)
member.summary: Checks if a culture is supported by this application
member.param: The culture info to check

member.name: M:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.IsLanguageSupportedEnglishName(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the language is supported with the english name. i.e. "English" "French" etc.
member.param: The english name of the language

member.name: M:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.GetCultureInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the culture info from the available languages list. If the language is not supported it will return null

member.name: M:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.GetSystemLanguageEnglishName
member.summary: Gets the name of the system language in an english name. If its SystemLanguage.Unknown, a string with the value "Unknown" will be returned.

member.name: M:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.GetSupportedLanguages
member.summary: Returns a list of all the supported languages in the project

member.name: M:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.GetKeysWithinCategory(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of keys within a specified category. Example: If you have keys named My.Key, the category would be "My."
member.returns: A list of keys that starts with the current category key
member.param: If you have keys named My.Key, the category would be "My."

member.name: M:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.GetTextValue(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a text value in the current language for the key. Returns null if nothing is found.

member.name: M:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.GetAudioClip(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the audio clip for the current language, returns null if nothing is found

member.name: M:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.GetPrefab(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the prefab game object for the current language, returns null if nothing is found

member.name: M:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.GetTexture(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a texture for the current language, returns null if nothing is found

member.name: M:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.HasKey(System.String)
member.summary: Returns whether or not the key is available in the system.

member.name: M:SmartLocalization.LanguageManager.GetLocalizedObject(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the localized object from the localizedObjectDataBase

member.summary: Loads and initializes a language file

member.summary: Gets the relative file path for the AvailableCultures xml. Use with Resources.Load as a TextAsset.

member.summary: Gets the relative folder path for the audio files by a specific language

member.summary: Gets the relative folder path for the texture files by a specific language

member.summary: The type of the localized object

member.summary: The localized object, used to determine what type the string value from the .resx file is

member.name: F:SmartLocalization.LocalizedObject.objectType
member.summary: The type of the localizedObject.

member.name: F:SmartLocalization.LocalizedObject.textValue
member.summary: The text value of the object, all objects are converted into string values in the end, whether it's a file path or a simple string value

member.summary: Variable if this object type is GAME_OBJECT

member.summary: Variable if this object type is AUDIO

member.name: F:SmartLocalization.LocalizedObject.thisTexture
member.summary: Variable if this object type is TEXTURE

member.summary: Variable if this object type is TEXT_ASSET

member.name: F:SmartLocalization.LocalizedObject.overrideLocalizedObject
member.summary: If this object should use an asset from a different language.

member.name: F:SmartLocalization.LocalizedObject.overrideObjectLanguageCode
member.summary: If overrideLocalizedObject is true, this is the language code that it will use to get the other language.

member.name: P:SmartLocalization.LocalizedObject.ObjectType
member.summary: Gets or sets the LocalizedObjectType of the object.

member.name: P:SmartLocalization.LocalizedObject.TextValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the text value.
member.value: The text value of the object, all objects are converted into string values in the end, whether it's a file path or a simple string value.

member.name: P:SmartLocalization.LocalizedObject.ThisGameObject
member.summary: Variable if this object type is GAME_OBJECT. Gets or sets the this game object.

member.name: P:SmartLocalization.LocalizedObject.ThisAudioClip
member.summary: Variable if this object type is AUDIO. Gets or sets the this AudioClip.

member.name: P:SmartLocalization.LocalizedObject.ThisTexture
member.summary: Variable if this object type is TEXTURE. Gets or sets the this Texture. Can be used with MovieTexture(Pro-only feature)

member.name: P:SmartLocalization.LocalizedObject.OverrideLocalizedObject
member.summary: Gets or sets if this object should use an asset from a different language.

member.name: P:SmartLocalization.LocalizedObject.OverrideObjectLanguageCode
member.summary: If overrideLocalizedObject is true, this gets or sets the language code that it will use to get the other language.

member.summary: Gets the LocalizedObjectType of the localized object.

member.summary: Gets the clean key. i.e the key without a type identifier "[type=TEXTURE]" etc.
member.returns: The clean key without the type identifier
member.param: The full key with the type identifier

member.summary: Gets the full key value with identifiers and everything

member.summary: Gets the full key value with identifiers and everything

member.summary: Performs a manual ToString() on a LocalizedObjectType enum since ToString() is not allowed on WebPlayer platforms.

member.returns: The string value of the localized object type enumeration

member.summary: Adds a culture info to the collection

member.returns: The culture info, returns null if not found

member.summary: Finds a culture info from the list by the ISO-639 language code.

member.returns: The found SmartCultureInfo. Returns null if nothing was found.

member.summary: Checks if a specific culture info is in this collection

member.returns: If the specified culture info was in the collection
